page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our block includes the major part of Wiveliscombe,a small rural town of less than 2000 inhabitants.A once prosperous market and brewery town it has declined to parish status. The 1980's have seen some environmental improvements with the opening of a by-pass,and the face lift given to the Square.Kingsmead Comprehensive acts as a focal point within the rural community.It provides useful numbers of jobs and draws children from a wide area,including farms,hamlets and the village of Fitzhead.The area is poorly served by public transport so entertainment is localised especially for youngsters 15% of Kingsmeads pupils live on farms but agriculture provides relatively few employment opporunities.The school has been nationally acclaimed for its careers record
